revised_title: Anatomy of Doris: A Study on the Internal Structure of a Nudibranchiate Mollusk
tldr: This study investigates the anatomy of the Doris genus of nudibranchiate mollusks, focusing on D. tuberculata, D. pilosa, and D. bilamellata. The authors provide detailed descriptions of the digestive, circulatory, and nervous systems, as well as the reproductive organs and the musculature of these species.
